summary: A Redoran styled homes just past the border into Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
===============WARNING================
The previous (release 1.0) version of this mod WAS NOT CLEAN. While it won't destroy your game, it did have a lot of unnecesary data. I HIGHLY recommend updating as soon as possible. While it shouldn't be mess with anything you have in the home from the previous version IT IS STILL EXTREMELY ADVISED TO START FROM A CLEAN SAVE.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/0miNNTC.png[/img]

======================Details========================
Fort Gnisis comes with everything you'd expect out of a player home:
REQUIRES DRAGONBORN

-A plethora of Mannequins, Weapon Plaques, and Shield Plaques
-Not lacking in display cases either
-Smelter, Forge, Workbench, Grindstone, and storage for related items.
-Areas to mine some lower leveled ores.
-Wood block for wood cutting.
-A LOT of room for companions -- It's what this mod was made for.
-A handful of book cases
-A vault for all your valuables, including an open chest so you can drop your goods in and watch your fortune grow.
-Shrines to Daedric lords featured in Dragonborn
-A room for Enchanting and Alchemy, complete with cool effects to really make you feel like a wizard.
-A brand new companion!
-Two new playable fire-enchanted ash spawn weapons! ((will be nerfed in next update))

For right now, you can fast travel directly to the forts entrance. It's an invisible door marker that you simply walk into like a cave (to make it seem like your character just walks there. It's supposed to be beyond Skyrims borders), Check the screenshots for details.

========================Bugs==================================
Only one that I can think of, which may or may not be fixed in a future update. You can't fast travel, as it's in its own worldspace, and I'm not sure how to "connect" it to Skyrim the same way the Fort Dawnguard (From the Dawnguard DLC, duh) is. If anyone knows how to do this, PLEASE send me a message.

It's been awhile since the last time I uploaded a mod, and the last one I had was rather... Disappointing. So be sure to tell me if you spot any bugs!

==========================Installation=================================
To install simply drag and drop the HlaaluRetreat.esp into the Data folder which SHOULD be located in C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\data

============================Version History===========================
1.1 -- Cleaned with Tes5Edit
1.0 -- Release

Plans for the Future
===========================Plans for the Future========================
-Integration with the map, hopefully
-A weekly time skip when traveling to and from the fort via the mountain passes
author: SikSikSikki
